All(String, String, Int32, Object)

Returns all the orders filtered by a SQL where clause. These query aliases you can use in your 'where' clause: [Order] o
[Address] ia (Invoice Address) [Address] sa (Shipping Address) [PaymentMethod] pm [ShippingMethod] sm [ProductOrderDetail] pod [TicketOrderDetail] tod [TicketSale] ts [Price] tsPrice (Ticket price) [PriceDefinition] tsPriceDef [Product] p [ProductToPrice] ptp [Price] price (Product's price) [PriceDefinition] priceDef (Product's price definition)

eq. where o.Id > 1

Single(String, Object)

Returns single order filtered by a SQL where clause. These query aliases you can use in your 'where' clause: [Order] o
[Address] ia (Invoice Address) [Address] sa (Shipping Address) [PaymentMethod] pm [ShippingMethod] sm [ProductOrderDetail] pod [TicketOrderDetail] tod [TicketSale] ts [Price] tsPrice (Ticket price) [PriceDefinition] tsPriceDef [Product] p [ProductToPrice] ptp [Price] price (Product's price) [PriceDefinition] priceDef (Product's price definition)

eq. where o.Id > 1
